thread.title: Grandmother trapped in home by tree uprooted by Storm Doris | Granada
thread.title_full: Grandmother trapped in home by tree uprooted by Storm Doris | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Grandmother trapped in home by tree uprooted by Storm Doris | Granada
text:
A grandmother is trapped in her home after a tree uprooted by Storm Doris blocked her garden path.
Bernie, 72, has been trapped by a tree Credit: Elise Pritchard Bernie, who's 72-years-old, lives in Wirral and uses rails along her garden path to support her as she walks.
The tree was uprooted by strong winds Credit: Elise Pritchard The fallen tree has bent railings Elise uses to support herself Credit: Elise Pritchard The fallen tree has bent and knocked down the railings.
The tree is completely blocking the path Credit: Elise Pritchard Her granddaughter Elise Pritchard said:
She's not able to walk very far and isn't stable on her feet, the tree has bent and knocked down these rails and she's unable to leave her house like this.
â€“ Elise, Bernie's granddaughter Last updated Thu 23 Feb 2017 Read more 26 updates Storm Doris batters North West Weather
